features: Featuring Natural Hemp Seed Oil - Our key ingredient brings a lightweight texture that absorbs quickly and is naturally rich in Vitamin E.
Nourishing Shea Butter, Aloe, Caffeine, Algae Extract, and Polypeptides - Packed with our signature blend of herbal extracts and plant-based ingredients to soothe and condition skin.
Age Defying Vanilla & Musk - A sweet, spiced scent enriched with herbal extracts.
Non-Greasy and Lightweight - A perfect formula for a daily body moisturizer packed with natural plant extracts and a delightful scent.
Cruelty Free & Vegan, Paraben Free, Gluten Free, and suited for all ages and skin types.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HEMPZ Body Lotion Age Defying - Vanilla & Musk Daily Moisturizing Cream, Shea Butter Body Moisturizer - Skin Care Products, Hemp Seed Oil - Large Nourishing Shea Butter, Aloe, Caffeine, Algae Extract, and Polypeptides - Packed with our signature blend of herbal extracts and plant-based ingredients to soothe and condition skin.Featuring Natural Hemp Seed Oil - Our key ingredient brings a lightweight texture that absorbs quickly and is naturally rich in Vitamin E.Non-Greasy and Lightweight - A perfect formula for a daily body moisturizer packed with natural plant extracts and a delightful scent.Age Defying Vanilla & Musk - A sweet, spiced scent enriched with herbal extracts.Hempz Body Moisturizer - Daily Herbal Moisturizer, Shea Butter Anti-Aging Body Moisturizer - Body Lotion, Hemp Extract Lotion - Skin Care Products, 100% Pure Organic Hemp Seed Oil

HEMPZ Body Lotion - Green Tea & Asian Pear Daily Moisturizing Cream, Shea Butter Body Moisturizer - Skin Care Products, Hemp Seed Oil - Large EXPERIENCE THE BENEFITS OF HEMP SEEDS: 100% Natural Hemp Seed Oil is rich in omega-6 and omega-3 fatty acids, enabling it to soothe atopic dermatitis, and limit oil production, so your skin will look and feel extraordinary.EXOTIC AND EXCITING: This luxurious body cream is scented with Green Tea and Pears, which will leave an alluring, romantic aroma on your skin. The smell is not too heavy, and since it contains no harsh chemicals, it will leave behind no residue.REVITALIZE YOUR SKIN: Acai Berry and Goji Berry combine with an essential extract blend that will balance, revitalize, and refresh your body from head to toe. It will help stimulate skin with regenerating ingredients.ENRICHED MOISTURIZER: Our exotic lotions contain Vitamins A, C, E, and B5, which will protect your skin from natural and environmentally triggered oxidants and elements. Your skin will feel nourished and healthy with these rich, conditioning creams.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality lotion!
reviews.reviewText: This lotion smells sooooo good and it is high quality! It goes on smooth and doesn't leave a greasy feel afterward. My skin soaks it in and feels hydrated all day long. It has skin loving ingredients and is made in the USA. I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect in every way
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using Hempz lotion for about 25ish years… a long time! It’s tried and true- so many brands change formulas or manufacturers but this product has not changed, thank goodness! It’s silky, moisturizing, smells amazing, and MOST importantly, it’s not greasy. Absolutely love it and use it day and night!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I can’t say enough good things about this stuff, I am totally addicted to the lotion. When you apply it, it’s non greasy and your skin absorbs it right away and is nice and soft. Definitely worth a try and it all smells great!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing scent and Amazing moisture
reviews.reviewText: My favorite moisturizer. I’m in my late 50’s and my skin was starting to get that crepe ness on my legs and arms. This has a light scent, not heavy, easy to apply and long lasting moisture. I apply at night after the shower. My skin loves it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy application, absorbs quickly, non greasy, moisturizer.
reviews.reviewText: Easy application, absorbs quickly, non oily, fresh scent, body moisturizer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m in love with the smell, very mild. Thick but somewhat quick absorbed, keep my skin moist all day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Lotion after a shower
reviews.reviewText: This lotion makes your skin so soft and a very nice light scent. Great price too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This lotion smells great. I love the hemp lotions and it has a little caffeine so you feel a little sensation after using it. My skin feels soft and I have not seen great anti aging results yet but smooth and hydrated yes

reviews.reviewTitle: Don't worry about the smell, some people are just too picky!
reviews.reviewText: I don't understand why people complain about the smell. Compared to most of the other lotions I use, even as a female, the smell isn't overbearing. It's earth and gentle. This lotion saved my skin in ways words can't justify. It's been consistently good for bottles of use, and is the only lotion I've used for the better part of 2 years. Dry Canadian winters don't stand a chance. I use it on my entire body after showers and I don't get dried out and itchy. It soaks in quickly that by the time I'm done moisturizing, I can get dressed and carry on with my day.
Very good skin moisturizer,with a clean aroma,not too strong with scent

I find that there's sort of good news and bad news with this lotion... the good news is that it feels incredible; it soaks in immediately & isn't greasy in the least and it doesn't need to be applied often (although I have been on my hands because I wash them so often & my house is *really* dry in the winter).The bad news (for me at least) is the scent. Before I ordered it I asked if it smelled the same as the original (I LOVE the scent of the original); two people said it did & two people said it didn't, one of whom said it smells exactly like the Body Shop's White Musk. I ordered it hoping that the first two were right but it turns out that it really does smell like White Musk. I used to wear that perfume years and years ago so I do like it but I was really hoping for the original scent.The only reason I bought this one is that there was no single bottle of the original, it was only available in a 2-pack, which I think I'll end up ordering anyway once I put a significant dent in this one.It arrived in 3 days and was really reasonably priced, so other than the scent I really have no complaints :).*Edit: After about a week of using this I'm pretty much over the scent because my skin has never been softer. The difference after only a week is huge, night & day -- I really can't recommend this highly enough.

reviews.reviewTitle: I tried one pump and it instantly sunk in, ...
reviews.reviewText: I tried one pump and it instantly sunk in, not greasy in the least but the scent is VERY strong. Exact copy of The Body Shop’s ‘White Musk’. I researched each scent and this one was supposed to be the most faint and pleasant and unisex but I can’t agree. Washed it off and the scent is still there about 10 hours later. I am sensitive to scent so I’m stuck with a lotion I cannot use. Darn it! I’ll have to give it as a gift.

reviews.reviewTitle: My bad. Lotion is great - I love the scent ...
reviews.reviewText: Paid double the price of anywhere else just for convenience. My bad. Lotion is great - I love the scent of the'original' Hempz Lotion.
